name: Space junk (itch) (47 Games' Studios)
description:
A crew of space pirates' ship has malfunctioned and enters its Interstellar mode randomly, which causes it to spin out uncontrollably into space. They now need to explore different planets in order to find parts for the repair.

DISCLAIMER

The game is still in very early development and will get updated periodically so stay tuned!

Current version: Alpha 0.1 , you can catch up on the newest updates by reading the latest devlog!  https://bit.ly/3atdlsM
